title: [Feature request] PackedSequence with length = 0
body_html:
If you run pack_padded_sequence(input, lengths) with one of the lengths <= 0 it raises a ValueError: length of all samples has to be greater than 0, but found an element in 'lengths' that is <=0.
Would it be possible to change it in order to accept even sequences with length zero? The reason is that when you run truncated backpropagation it could happen that some sequences become empty in the last steps and it would be easier to use the same batch size along the whole backpropagation.

body:
If you run `pack_padded_sequence(input, lengths)` with one of the lengths <= 0 it raises a `ValueError: length of all samples has to be greater than 0, but found an element in 'lengths' that is <=0`.   
Would it be possible to change it in order to accept even sequences with length zero? The reason is that when you run truncated backpropagation it could happen that some sequences become empty in the last steps and it would be easier to use the same batch size along the whole backpropagation.
